description:
Job Description

Note: This is a hybrid position based in Century City, CA, with 4 days on-site and 1 day working from home.

About Our ClientOur client is a dedicated personal injury law firm, serving clients throughout California with a passion for maximizing recovery for accident victims. Their commitment to personalized attention and client success drives the firms strong culture of advocacy and teamwork.

Job Description

  • Handle payroll and time cards for staff
  • Manage recruitment processes, including resume screening and hiring
  • Oversee employee discipline and performance evaluations
  • Foster a positive firm culture
  • Maintain HR compliance and records management

Qualifications

Qualifications

  • Must have at least 2 years of recent experience in HR
  • Must have worked in HR at a law firm in 1 out of the past 3 years
  • Strong HR generalist skills, including payroll, recruitment, and compliance
  • Excellent communication and organizational abilities
  • Law firm or professional services experience is a plus
  • Familiarity with California employment laws

Why Is This a Great Opportunity

Why This is a Great Opportunity

  • Join a respected firm with a positive, collaborative culture
  • Play a key role in shaping HR functions
  • Opportunity for growth within a dynamic legal environment

Benefits

  • 401(k)
  • 401(k) matching
  • Dental insurance
  • Health insurance
  • Paid time off
  • Vision insurance

Salary Type : Annual Salary

Salary Min : $ 65000

Salary Max : $ 95000

Currency Type : USD
